name: Mercular Enterprises Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of an e-commerce platform intended to offer lifestyle hobbyists products in Thailand. The company's platform provides all hobby-related products including gaming, gadgets, headphone, speakers, IT equipment, and mobile accessories, enabling customers with different products delivered to their place with an explicit warranty and after-sales service.
one_liner: Operator of an e-commerce platform intended to offer lifestyle hobbyists products in Thailand. The company's platform provides all hobby-related products including gaming, gadgets, headphone, speakers, IT equipment, and mobile accessories, enabling customers with different products delivered to their place with an explicit warranty and after-sales service.
